attributes.action: Petition against the proposed closure of Tilstock CE Primary School
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition against the proposed closure of Tilstock C.E Primary School. Taking into account the planned proposals for housing development in Whitchurch and Tilstock, we believe the school provides the facility to accommodate growing numbers of pupils and retains the right to parental choice.
Please sign this petition in support of our objection for the county councils proposal.
